categories: Category:Sith Lords of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Janton Belos was a minor Sith Lord, who lived during the height of the Sith Empire.

Belos took Valik Kodank as his consort and he taught her the ways of the Sith, to keep her interested in him. However, she became more powerful than he ever imagined and created a secret sect of followers, which she kept secret from him.
